FindUtxoForMintNFT(String, String, Int32, Double)

Find utxo which can be used for minting. It means it has token amount > 1

Declaration
public static Task<List<Utxos>> FindUtxoForMintNFT(string addr, string tokenId, int numberToMint = 1, double oneTokenSat = 10000)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String addr

address which has utxos
System.String tokenId

token id hash
System.Int32 numberToMint

number of tokens which will be minted - because of multimint
System.Double oneTokenSat

this is usually default. On Neblio all token tx should have value 10000sat
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Collections.Generic.List<Utxos>>

FindUtxoToSplit(String, String, Int32, Double)

Find utxo which can be splited to lots. It is specific function which is used to auto splitter (old version, new version will do in in one tx) missing number of lots. this is covered by function which use it.

Declaration
public static Task<Utxos> FindUtxoToSplit(string addr, string tokenId, int lotAmount = 100, double oneTokenSat = 10000)
Parameters
Type Name Description

address which has utxos
System.String tokenId

token id hash
System.Int32 lotAmount

amount of tokens in one lot
System.Double oneTokenSat

this is usually default. On Neblio all token tx should have value 10000sat
Returns
